application_type_full: Prior Approval: Development for electronic communications network
description: Telecommunication - Installation of a 20m Phosco Monopole supporting 6no. antennas, 1no. 300mm transmission dish, 1no. 600mm transmission dishes and ancillary development thereto. (summary)
site_name: TELECOMMUNICATION INSTALLATION NORTH OF TRADING DEPOT
decision_conditions:
Before any of the above ground works (cabinets and mast) in connection with the development hereby permitted commences at the site, a Maintenance Strategy for the telecommunications equipment hereby approved, specifically covering, but not limited to, responses to vandalism / graffiti, shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The details as approved shall be implemented at the site prior to the telecommunications equipment hereby approved becomes operational and shall be maintained as approved for the life of the development. 

Reason: In order to ensure that the proposal does not contribute to increased incidences of crime, fear of crime, and antisocial behaviour, in accordance with Local Plan Policy LP26.
